title.narrative: PeriSan- Sanitation in peri urban areas

description.narrative: To support improved and sustainable access to sanitation of 270 poor people from 5 unplanned areas of Ouagadougou -including 124 740 children . This figure represents 67% of people living in informal and peri urban settlements of the capital city.

participating-org.narrative: Bureau d'Etudes et de Recherches Appliquées

activity-date.narrative: Date that project is due to end
Date that project started to the nearest quarter

mailing-address.narrative: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
